Description.Text: Facilities Guests can enjoy a pleasant stay in one of the 135 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include room service, a conference room and a business centre. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the hotel. Rooms The accommodation features rooms with a kitchen. All rooms offer a fridge, a tea/coffee station and WiFi. Special family rooms are available for families with children. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. The hotel features numerous leisure facilities, including a pool and an outdoor pool. The accommodation offers a gym (for a fee) to travellers.
The accommodation features rooms with a kitchen. All rooms offer a fridge, a tea/coffee station and WiFi. Special family rooms are available for families with children.

Guests can enjoy a pleasant stay in one of the 135 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include room service, a conference room and a business centre. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the hotel.

The establishment offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. The hotel features numerous leisure facilities, including a pool and an outdoor pool. The accommodation offers a gym (for a fee) to travellers.
There is a resort fee payable by the guest.
